name: Lineup - A simple text aligner
summary: Aligns the Nth occurence of a string or RE
description:
Use Align.vim vimscript#294, it knows a lot more!

It is a simple text aligner
:'<,'>Lineup = to align your visually selected equations.
install_details: Drop it into your plugin directory

versions.release_notes:
* Bugfixes
* Allows to lineup Nth occurence
